name: Hotdog Man
description: This is a recreational puzzle game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: graphics card supporting DirectX 9 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 4 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: graphics card supporting DirectX 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any
